summary: Simple, your selected icon will be display in game UI.
descriptionHtml:
[center]Do you use "[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/82725/?]Customizable UI Replacer[/url]" ?

It has an icon on the screen. I editted some icons for it. You have 15 options so choose.
[color=#ff0000][u][b]only DS style for now![/b][/u][/color]


[size=4]SOME ICONS[/size]
[color=#ff0000][size=1][b]you got some more options ![/b][/size][/color]
[img]https://i.hizliresim.com/9dM1rr.png[/img][img]https://i.hizliresim.com/qW6kNQ.png[/img][img]https://i.hizliresim.com/MvNGB2.png[/img]

[img]https://i.hizliresim.com/Q7D3zG.png[/img][img]https://i.hizliresim.com/0Bv6po.png[/img]

SEE IMAGES SECTION TO PREVIEW!
Send me your SS ! :)

Installation

1- Go Modfile/swf files
2- Choose a file
3- Copy the "amotsymbolwidget.swf" file
4- Replace the file to Customizable UI mod /Interface/exported/widgets
[size=4][u][b]OR
[/b][/u][/size]5-  Replace the file to Data/Interface/exported/widgets 

if you have not the folders, you may create.


ISSUES & BUGS

[quote]posted by [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/1985511]xdabearz
@ 6:53, 2 Jan 2018[/url]
Custom UI requires Widget mod which requires the DLC which aren't present for Enderal.

I found a workaround to make it work, but I think you should mention it in the description somehwere: 

https://www.reddit.com/r/enderal/comments/5wjac4/mods_that_require_dlc_with_enderal/

I'm not trying to be condescending or anything, I just wanted to help those who might get frustrated when installing this. Thanks![/quote]



[b][color=#ff0000][u]VERY IMPORTANT NOTE TO RECLAIMER[/u][/color][/b]
I am not the owner of the icons. They all came from;
https://strongjawdesigns.deviantart.com

I tried to contact the creator but there is not any mail adress or something. In addition her last tweet and deviant from "2015". Her name is in credits section. 
[/center]
[center][b][color=#ff00ff][size=5]ENJOY!


[/size][/color][/b][b][u]Credits[/u][/b]
strongjawdesign for original icons
ismetisgor for editting
[b]Elxdark[/b] for Customizable UI mod[/center]
author: ismetisgor
